Class AcaaSStatusService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.service.Service

        • com.robsonmartins.acaas.AcaaSStatusService

  • public class AcaaSStatusService
extends org.restlet.service.StatusService
    Manipula status dos servicos REST do AcaaS (Acessibilidade como um Servico).
    Author:
    Robson Martins (robson@robsonmartins.com)

    • Method Detail

      • getStatus

        public org.restlet.data.Status getStatus(java.lang.Throwable throwable,
                                org.restlet.resource.Resource resource)
        Returns a status for a given exception or error. By default it returns an Status.SERVER_ERROR_INTERNAL status and logs a severe message. In order to customize the default behavior, this method can be overridden.
        Overrides:
        getStatus in class org.restlet.service.StatusService
        Parameters:
        throwable - The exception or error caught.
        resource - The parent resource.
        Returns:
        The representation of the given status.

      • getRepresentation

        public org.restlet.representation.Representation getRepresentation(org.restlet.data.Status status,
                                                          org.restlet.Request request,
                                                          org.restlet.Response response)
        Returns a representation for the given status. In order to customize the default representation, this method can be overridden. It returns null by default.
        Overrides:
        getRepresentation in class org.restlet.service.StatusService
        Parameters:
        status - The status to represent.
        request - The request handled.
        response - The response updated.
        Returns:
        The representation of the given status.
